title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Friday, August 11 (game #564)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Wacom launches four, affordable drawing tablets with the aspiring artist in mind
description: Each model comes with performance-boosting features like 4K pressure sensitivity and a screen said to support no parallax.

title: Top open source project Moq slammed for secretly collecting user data
description: Moq developer quietly slipped in obfuscated code which compromised the nature of the open-source software.

title: ChatGPT is a bad knowledge base, confirms new study
description: A paper comparing how ChatGPT fares answering software engineering questions versus Stack Overflow once again highlights that it’s not infallible as a fountain of knowledge.

title: The US government is launching a competition to find the best AI for fixing flaws
description: DARPA holding competition to see which teams can best fix software flaws with AI.

title: Fortnite Chapter 4 Season 3 end date and Season 4 release timings

title: Mac users are facing more dangerous security threats than ever before

title: Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) challenges universities to support Tor
description: The Tor University Challenge calls academics to do their part to foster privacy and free speech online. Here's all you need to know to join the initiative.

title: Microsoft 365 users targeted by major phishing campaign
description: Someone's going after Microsoft 365 accounts belonging to C-level execs.

title: Apple has changed how you end calls on iOS 17 and we hate it

title: Your Disney Plus and Hulu fees are going up – and it's all Netflix's fault

description: Papers, Please celebrates its ten year anniversary by taking things back in time.

title: Exclusive: Samsung wants to kill hard drives with this 256TB SSD

title: What is an eSim?
description: An eSIM is a SIM card embedded into your smartphone that can not be removed like the usual physical SIM card.

title: The iPhone 15 Pro might not be as powerful as we’d hoped

title: Google unveils eSignature tool for Docs and Drive

title: Got a blank YouTube homepage? You may now need to turn on your watch history
description: YouTube states it will no longer provide recommended videos to accounts that have their watch history tool turned off.
